functional_jobs.job_statement: When I'm considering attending an event, I want to know how many people are on the waitlist, so I can make an informed decision about whether to buy tickets.
functional_jobs.current_solution: The current platform does not provide waitlist information.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Lack of visibility into the waitlist makes it difficult to gauge demand for the event, leading to uncertainty about ticket purchases.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: To have clear visibility on the waitlist numbers to assess my chances of getting a ticket and make a confident purchase decision.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Ability to view real-time waitlist counts for events, leading to more confident ticket purchasing decisions.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I am deciding on attending an event, I want to feel reassured about my investment, so I can avoid feeling regret if I miss out.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Currently, I rely on guesswork or limited information.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Uncertainty leads to anxiety about whether to buy tickets or not, which can result in missed opportunities.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: To feel confident and secure in my decision to purchase tickets.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Feeling of reassurance and confidence when making a decision to attend an event.

social_jobs.job_statement: When discussing my event attendance plans with friends, I want to appear knowledgeable about the event's popularity, so I can enhance my social standing.
social_jobs.current_solution: I share my thoughts based on assumptions without concrete data.
social_jobs.pain_points: Insufficient information can make me feel less credible or informed when discussing plans with peers.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: To be perceived as someone who knows about popular events and can make informed choices.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Receiving positive feedback from peers about my knowledge of event popularity.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I am planning my event attendance, I want to evaluate the overall interest in the event, so I can decide whether to attend or invite others.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: I look for reviews or past attendance data.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Lack of specific attendee data makes it challenging to gauge overall interest accurately.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: To have comprehensive insights into both the waitlist and overall attendance trends for making better planning decisions.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Being able to assess event interest through detailed metrics, leading to more effective planning and socializing.
